executiveSummary: Whitney and Chaz Gates, founders of Wondry Cocktail Wines, pitched their premium, fruit-infused wines to the Sharks seeking $185,000 for an 8% equity stake. After showcasing their strong sales performance, unique market positioning, and compelling personal stories, Mark Cuban offered $225,000 for 15%, which they accepted.
keyDecisions: Mark Cuban invested $225,000 in Wondry Cocktail Wines for a 15% equity stake.
